name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited an application vulnerability to execute unauthorized commands, resulting in data exfiltration.

parallel--a1b2c3d4-e5f6-47da-8f7e-9ef345.name: Immediate Mitigations
parallel--a1b2c3d4-e5f6-47da-8f7e-9ef345.description: Execute actions to mitigate the incident immediately.

action--4f817d66-2d9c-4cce-b16c-d69cb29d.name: Kill malicious process
action--4f817d66-2d9c-4cce-b16c-d69cb29d.description: Terminate the malicious script that has been executed.

action--be912819-25fb-429c-b7bf-9e6c6eda.name: Scan for other threats
action--be912819-25fb-429c-b7bf-9e6c6eda.description: Perform a thorough scan of the system to identify additional threats.

action--67f23b78-3bf9-495e-9187-09c9df11.name: Reset compromised user accounts
action--67f23b78-3bf9-495e-9187-09c9df11.description: Disable access for compromised user accounts.

commands.command: for user in $(cat compromised_users.txt); do passwd -l $user; done

compromised_users_file.description: File containing the list of compromised user accounts.

action--37a97de5-f704-425c-aefc-fdfb692d.name: Block outbound connections to suspicious IP
action--37a97de5-f704-425c-aefc-fdfb692d.description: Prevent data exfiltration by blocking outbound traffic to the suspicious IP.

action--33dc0ba8-9f85-4731-9759-7dd142b2.name: Restrict script execution
action--33dc0ba8-9f85-4731-9759-7dd142b2.description: Enforce script execution policies to prevent further malicious script execution.

loop--ea05e484-d172-4eda-88a5-2144bc5ec9.name: Threat Scan Loop
loop--ea05e484-d172-4eda-88a5-2144bc5ec9.description: Continue scanning until the system is confirmed clean.
